document_data.name: Iza Blouin
document_data.mainbody:
'''Iza Blouin''' was an inhabitant of the city of [[Baldur's Gate]] in late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''Keep your distance, pal. I don't want it on record that I've met you.''|Iza Blouin}}
document_data.Description: Iza was a blush-skinned [[Half-elf|half]] [[high elf]] with chestnut hair and blue eyes.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, as the [[Cult of the Absolute]] menaced the city of Baldur's Gate, Iza could be found gossiping in the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] with her friend â€“ [[Sharlz Molar]]. Iza eagerly consumed the ''[[Baldur's Mouth]] Gazetteer,'' and even though she knew one should not believe every word that the [[broadsheet]] printed, Iza still avoided associating with individuals who were bad-mouthed by the publication.
